sect1.title: Concept List
sect1.para: The concept list shows a list of all the concepts on the network.
It is then possible to use the visibility column to make some nodes invisible (by ticking/unticking and cliking on the "Apply" button), as shown on the screenshot below.

Clicking on the "Store to GDS" button will save the latest visibility applied. Clicking on the "Load from GDS" button will load the latest visibility saved. Clicking on the "Load from GDS" button without using the "Store to GDS" button first will make all nodes invisible.
